FuncDef: This command creates an IPFIX export policy with a set of transport parameters that will be used to transmit IPFIX records generated by an application within 7750 SR node to an external collector node. This policy name can be referenced from each application within 7750 SR that requires flow logging.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the policy that can be referenced within an application in 7750 SR node that requires flow logging.
Keyword used to create the policy.
